title: Truth & Life Audio Bible - The Christmas and Easter Story
description:
The Christmas and Easter Stories were taken from The Truth & Life Dramatized audio Bible New Testament and is endorsed with an Imprimatur from the. Voiced by internationally-renowned actors The Truth & Life audio New Testament is a first of its kind dramatized audio Bible from the RSV-CE translation. The dramatized recording is enhanced with sound effects and music that make the Christmas and Easter narratives come alive.

Looking for a digital version of the Audio New Testament? Download the FREE LCM Bible App featuring the Truth and Life Audio, the full text of the RSV-CE Bible, and other amazing content. http://www.lighthousecatholicmedia.org/app
